title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Gains $500M as Wall Street Appetite for BTC Grows
description: Money keeps flowing into the new ETFs, and as a result, BTC continues flying high.

title: Nifty Island Co-Founder on Why Play-to-Airdrop Is the Game's 'Booster Rocket'
description: Nifty Island co-founder Charles Smith joins Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward to discuss the game's play-to-airdrop campaign, why token incentives are so important to getting crypto games off the ground, and how the team plans to sustain its growth going forward.

title: Ethereum Co-Founder Transfers $38,270,000 in ETH to Kraken As Crypto Markets Rally
description:
One of the co-founders of Ethereum just moved over $38 million in ETH to the crypto exchange Kraken as digital asset markets move higher. First spotted by blockchain tracking firm Arkham Intelligence, Jeffrey Wilcke, one of the original founders of Ethereum, sent 10,000 ETH worth $27.52 million to Kraken early Wednesday morning. And over the […]

The post Ethereum Co-Founder Transfers $38,270,000 in ETH to Kraken As Crypto Markets Rally appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
